product_name: ExOfficio Jandiggity Fleece Hoodie - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Zip up the ExOfficio Jandiggity fleece hoodie and watch all your old sweatshirts start to gather dust. The soft texture, lightweight warmth and perfect fit are sure to make this one a wardrobe staple. Shirt-weight polyester fleece provides lightweight warmth and natural breathability for comfort in a range of conditions; it also dries quickly and wicks away moisture. Full-length zipper; handwarmer pockets; attached hood. ExOfficio Jandiggity fleece features a zippered security pocket on the left sleeve. Closeout.
short_description: Zip up the ExOfficio Jandiggity fleece hoodie and watch all your old sweatshirts start to gather dust. The soft texture, lightweight warmth and perfect fit are sure to make this one a wardrobe staple.
